item.description:
With apologies for no notice, the date has been changed to Sunday, March 24th. Â We hope to see you there!

Wine tasting at the restored Nahant Life Saving Station -- with its incredible views -- will benefit the Nahant Preservation Trust. Last year's event was lots of fun and this year's will be too. $10 per person at the door. We hope to see you there!

Great "90+" wines will also be for sale at great prices!! Stock up for the season - part of the sale proceeds also benefit the Trust.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Wine Tasting
